QuestData.Title: Breaking Down the Defenses
QuestData.Description: Even the strongest defense can still have a weakness, $c. We just need to find the weakness in the Sunreaver's defense and then exploit it as much as possible.$b$bScouts have reported the use of perimeter wards around Dawnseeker Promontory. They're powerful, but not deadly.$b$bDisabling them would allow us to keep closer watch on their activities.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy 6 Sunreaver Perimeter Wards around Dawnseeker Promontory.
